articles.title: Biden to Include Minimum Tax on Billionaires in Budget Proposal - The New York Times
articles.description: The tax would require that American households worth more than $100 million pay a rate of at least 20 percent on their full income, as well as unrealized gains in the value of liquid assets like stocks.
articles.content: Senator Elizabeth Warren, Democrat of Massachusetts, and Senator Ron Wyden, Democrat of Oregon and the chairman of the Finance Committee, released separate proposals last year that would tax the weal… [+1001 chars]

articles.title: Russia-Ukraine war: Putin is a dictator... he cannot remain in power, says Biden - TheCable
articles.description: Joe Biden, president of the United States of America, says Russian President Vladimir Putin “cannot remain in power"...
articles.content:

articles.title: American Ashley Cain-Gribble taken to hospital after hard fall at world championships - CBC.ca
articles.description: Ashley Cain-Gribble of USA fell hard during her pairs free program Thursday at the world championships and was taken to hospital for evaluation.
